title.narrative: Ethiopia - Wacha - Maji Road Upgrading Project

description.narrative: The project objective is to improve accesssibility and mobility of the population in project zone of influence to market and social and economic facilities through construction of an all weather engineered gravel road with intermittent paved road sections on steep gradients.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
